data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal volume Cavalcanti, Fernanda F., Chagas, Cléslei, Fonseca, Evelyn S. M. (2019): Taxonomic redescription of Leucandrilla wasinensis (Jenkin, 1908) and L. intermedia (Row, 1909) (Porifera, Calcarea): a first step to improve current knowledge on the typical features of the genus. Zootaxa 4568 (1), DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4568.1.2
